author: Special Correspondent
text: Due to line and power block to facilitate engineering works between Kadambattur and Thiruvalangadu stations on the Chennai-Arakkonam section, the suburban train services will be operated on the third line and will not stop at Senjipanambakkam for 11 days from Friday. The Moore Market Complex– Arakkonam electric multiple unit leaving at 11 a.m., MMC – Tiruttani EMU leaving at 11.45 a.m. and Velachery – Chennai Beach – Tiruttani service leaving at 11.20 a.m., a Southern Railway press release said.
title: No stoppage of suburban trains
